choices.name: Delay_with_Drug_Test_or_Health_Screenings
choices.choiceText: Delay with Drug Test or Health Screenings

value.stringValue: Delay with Drug Test or Health Screenings

choices.name: Hire_Unable_to_Start_on_Targeted_Date
choices.choiceText: Hire Unable to Start on Targeted Date

value.stringValue: Hire Unable to Start on Targeted Date

choices.name: Involuntary_No_Return_from_FMLA_or_Other_Leave
choices.choiceText: Involuntary – No Return from FMLA or Other Leave

value.stringValue: Involuntary – No Return from FMLA or Other Leave

choices.name: Involuntary_Unscheduled_Term_by_Client_due_to_Pandemic
choices.choiceText: Involuntary - Unscheduled Term by Client due to Pandemic

value.stringValue: Involuntary - Unscheduled Term by Client due to Pandemic

choices.name: Onboarding_Delayed_Client_Delayed_Start_Date
choices.choiceText: Onboarding Delayed & Client Delayed Start Date

value.stringValue: Onboarding Delayed & Client Delayed Start Date

choices.name: Worker_not_Interested_in_the_Assignment
choices.choiceText: Worker not Interested in the Assignment

value.stringValue: Worker not Interested in the Assignment

Flow.description: No Submit Updated SD check for valid attachment Formula varDescriptions

formulas.name: Effective_Date_to_TXT
formulas.expression: TEXT({!Effective_Start_Date_Mandatory})

formulas.name: End_Date_to_TXT
formulas.expression: TEXT({!Target_End_Date})

formulas.name: FullTimePartTime
formulas.expression: "Full-Time/Part-Time"

formulas.name: varActual_Start_Date_ASDDtoTXT
formulas.expression: TEXT ({!Actual_Start_Date_ASDD})

formulas.name: varAllCR1
formulas.expression: "Placement Status Change" + "Assignment Start Date Delay" + "End of Assignment" + "Pay Rates" + "Bill Rates" + "Pay and Bill Rates" + "Time Sheet Approvers" + "Allocation and Producers" + "Contract to Hire" + "Assignment Extension" + "Others" + "Customer Level Changes" + "Perdiem " + "Physical Work Address " + "Remote Working" + "Full-Time/Part-Time" + "Internal Job Title Change" + "End of Employment" + "Immigration" + "PTO" + "HOL"

formulas.name: varAllocationandProducers
formulas.expression:
"Effective Date: " + TEXT ({!Effective_Start_Date_Mandatory}) + "
"+ IF(ISBLANK({!Client_Service_Manager}), "", "Client Service Manager: " + {!Client_Service_Manager} + "
")+ IF(ISBLANK({!Non_Commissionable_Recruiter}), "", "Non Commissionable Recruiter: " + {!Non_Commissionable_Sales_Person} +"
") + IF(ISBLANK({!Non_Commissionable_Sales_Person}), "", "Non Commissionable Sales Person: " + {!Non_Commissionable_Sales_Person}+ "
") + IF(ISBLANK({!Recruiter_Name}), "", "Recruiter Name: " + {!Recruiter_Name}+ "
") + IF(ISBLANK({!Recruiter_Override_Name}), "", "Recruiter Override Name: " + {!Recruiter_Override_Name}+ "
") + IF(ISBLANK({!Recruiter_Percentage}), "", "Recruiter Percentage: "+ TEXT({!Recruiter_Percentage})+ "
") + IF(ISBLANK({!Recruiter_Secondary_Name}), "", "Recruiter Secondary Name: " + {!Recruiter_Secondary_Name}+ "
") + IF(ISBLANK({!Recruiter_Secondary_Percentage}), "", "Recruiter Secondary Percentage: " + TEXT ({!Recruiter_Secondary_Percentage})+ "
") + IF(ISBLANK({!Recruiter_Team}), "", "Recruiter Team: " + {!Recruiter_Team}+ "
") + IF(ISBLANK({!Sales_Person}), "", "Sales Person: " + {!Sales_Person}+ "
") + IF(ISBLANK({!Sales_Person_Percentage}), "", "Sales Person Percentage: " + TEXT({!Sales_Person_Percentage})+ "
") + IF(ISBLANK({!Sales_Person_Secondary}), "", "Sales Person Secondary: " + {!Sales_Person_Secondary}+ "
") + IF(ISBLANK({!Sales_Person_Secondary_Percentage}), "", "Sales Person Secondary Percentage: "+ TEXT({!Sales_Person_Secondary_Percentage})+ "
") + IF(ISBLANK({!Sales_Person_Override}), "", "Sales Person Override: " + {!Sales_Person_Override}+ "
")

formulas.name: varAssignmentExtension
formulas.expression: "Target End Date: " + TEXT({!Target_End_Date})

formulas.name: varAssignmentStartDateDelay
formulas.expression:
"Actual Start Date: " + {!varActual_Start_Date_ASDDtoTXT} + "
" + "Change Reason: " + {!Change_Reason_ASDD_Screen}

formulas.name: varBillRates
formulas.expression:
"Effective Start Date: " + TEXT ({!Effective_Start_Date_Mandatory}) + "
" + "Bill Rate Standard: "+ TEXT ({!Bill_Rate_Standard}) +"
" + "Bill Rate Overtime: "+ TEXT ({!Bill_Rate_Overtime}) +"
" + "Bill Rate Double Time: " + TEXT ({!Bill_Rate_Double_Time}) +"
" + IF ({!Do_you_want_to_update_Special_Bill} == 'Yes',{!varSpecialRates},"")

formulas.name: varContracttoHire
formulas.expression:
"Target Start Date: " + TEXT({!Target_Start_Date}) +"
"+ {!ContracttoHire_Picklist} + ":" + TEXT({!Fee_Amount}) + "
"+ "Conversion Salary: " + TEXT({!Conversion_Salary})

formulas.name: varConversion_AmounttoTXT
formulas.expression: TEXT({!Fee_Amount})

formulas.name: varCurrentItemfromLoop
formulas.expression: IF(ISNULL({!Loop_for_Attachment_component}), 1, 0)

formulas.name: varCustomerLevelChanges
formulas.expression:
IF (ISBLANK({!Placement_ID_NM2}), "", "Placement ID: " + TEXT({!Placement_ID_NM2}) + "
") + IF (ISBLANK({!First_Name_NM}), "", "First Name: " + {!First_Name_NM}+ "
") + IF (ISBLANK({!Last_Name_NM}), "", "Last Name: " + {!Last_Name_NM}+ "
") + IF (ISBLANK({!Request_Summary}), "", "Request Summary: " + {!Request_Summary} + "
") + "Description:
" + {!Description_CustomerLevelChanges}

formulas.name: varEndofAssignment
formulas.expression:
"Target End Date: " + TEXT ({!Target_End_Date}) + "
" + "Reason: " + {!Reason_Endof}

formulas.name: varEndofEmployment
varFLName_M
formulas.expression:
"Placement ID: " + TEXT ({!Placement_ID})+ "
" + "First Name: " + {!First_Name} + "
" + "Last Name " + {!Last_Name} + "
" + IF (ISBLANK({!Request_Summary}), "", "Request Summary: " + {!Request_Summary} + "
") + "
"

formulas.name: varFullTimePartTime
formulas.expression:
"Effective Start Date: " + TEXT({!Effective_Date_TSA}) + "
" + {!Part_Time_or_Full_Time}

formulas.name: varHOL
varImmigration
varInternalJobTitleChange
formulas.expression:
"Effective Start Date: " + TEXT ({!Effective_Start_Date_Mandatory}) + "
" + "Internal Job Title: " + {!Internal_Job_Title}

formulas.name: varNameMandatory
formulas.expression: "Placement Status Change" + "Assignment Start Date Delay" + "End of Assignment" + "Pay Rates" + "Bill Rates" + "Pay and Bill Rates" + "Time Sheet Approvers" + "Allocation and Producers" + "Contract to Hire" + "Assignment Extension" + "Perdiem " + "Physical Work Address " + "Remote Working" + "Full-Time/Part-Time" + "Internal Job Title Change" + "End of Employment" + "Immigration" + "PTO" + "HOL"

formulas.name: varNoSubmit
formulas.expression: "Job Class" + "New Assignment Client Onboarding" + "Exempt Status" + "Customer Engagement" + "Pay Type" + "Legal Employer" + "Segmentation" + "Shifts Change" + "Alternative Work Schedules" + "Supplier Change" + "Employment Type Change"

formulas.name: varOthers
formulas.expression:
IF (ISBLANK({!Placement_ID_NM2}), "", "Placement ID:" + TEXT({!Placement_ID_NM2}) + "
") + IF (ISBLANK({!First_Name_NM}), "", "First Name: " + {!First_Name_NM}+ "
") + IF (ISBLANK({!Last_Name_NM}), "", "Last Name: " + {!Last_Name_NM}+ "
") + IF (ISBLANK({!Request_Summary}), "", "Request Summary: " + {!Request_Summary} + "
") + "
"+ "Summary:
" + {!Summary_Others}

formulas.description: Formula for Pay and Bill Rage
formulas.name: varPayandBillRate
formulas.expression:
"
" + "Effective Start Date: " + TEXT ({!Effective_Start_Date_Mandatory}) + "
" + "Bill Rate Standard: "+ TEXT ({!Bill_Rate_Standard}) +"
" + "Bill Rate Overtime: "+ TEXT ({!Bill_Rate_Overtime}) +"
" + "Bill Rate Double Time: " + TEXT ({!Bill_Rate_Double_Time}) +"
"+ "Pay Rate Standard: "+ TEXT ({!Pay_Rate_Standard}) +"
" + "Pay Rate Overtime: "+ TEXT ({!Pay_Rate_Overtime}) +"
" + "Pay Rate Double Time: " + TEXT ({!Pay_Rate_Double_Time}) + IF ({!Do_you_want_to_update_Special_Rates} == 'Yes',{!varSpecialRates},"")

formulas.name: varPayRates
formulas.expression:
"
" + "Effective Start Date: " + TEXT ({!Effective_Start_Date_Mandatory}) + "
" + "Pay Rate Standard: "+ TEXT ({!Pay_Rate_Standard}) +"
" + "Pay Rate Overtime : "+ TEXT ({!Pay_Rate_Overtime}) +"
" + "Pay Rate Double Time: " + TEXT ({!Pay_Rate_Double_Time}) + IF ({!Do_you_want_to_update_Special_Pay} == 'Yes',{!varSpecialRates},"")

formulas.name: varPerdiem
formulas.expression:
IF (ISBLANK({!Effective_Start_Date_NotMandatory}),"" ,"Effective Start Date: " + TEXT({!Effective_Start_Date_NotMandatory}) + "
" ) + IF (ISBLANK({!Effective_End_Date_NotMandatory}),"" ,"Effective End Date: " + TEXT( {!Effective_End_Date_NotMandatory}) + "
" ) + IF (ISBLANK({!Is_Per_Diem_Billable}), "", "Is Per Diem Billable: " + {!Is_Per_Diem_Billable} + "
") + "Per Diem Rate: " + TEXT({!Per_Diem_Rate})

formulas.name: varPhysicalWorkAddress
formulas.expression:
"Effective Start Date: " + TEXT({!Effective_Start_Date_Mandatory}) + "
"+ "Street Address Line 1: " + {!Street_Address_Line_1} + "
"+ IF (ISBLANK({!Street_Address_Line_2}), "", "Street Address Line 2:" + {!Street_Address_Line_2} +"
" ) + IF (ISBLANK({!Street_Address_Line_3}), "", "Street Address Line 3:" + {!Street_Address_Line_3} +"
" ) + "City: " + {!City} + "
"+ "County: " + {!County} + "
"+ "State: " + {!State} + "
"+ "Country: " +{!Country} + "
"+ "Zip: " + {!Zip} + "
"

formulas.name: varPlacementIdtoTXT
formulas.expression: TEXT({!Placement_ID})

formulas.name: varPlacementStatusChange
formulas.expression:
"Effective Date: " + TEXT({!Effective_Start_Date_Mandatory}) + "
" + "Placement Status Change: " + {!Placement_Status} + "
" + "Reason: " + {!Placement_Status_Reason} + "
"

formulas.name: varPTO
varRemoteWorking
formulas.expression:
"Effective Start Date: " + TEXT({!Effective_Start_Date_Mandatory}) + "
"+ "Working Remote: " + {!Working_Remote}

formulas.name: varRequestDetails
formulas.expression: IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Allocation and Producers', {!varFLName_M} + {!varAllocationandProducers}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Assignment Extension', {!varFLName_M} + {!varAssignmentExtension}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Assignment Start Date Delay', {!varFLName_M} + {!varAssignmentStartDateDelay}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Bill Rates', {!varFLName_M} + {!varBillRates}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Contract to Hire',{!varFLName_M} + {!varContracttoHire}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Customer Level Changes', {!varCustomerLevelChanges}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'End of Assignment', {!varFLName_M} + {!varEndofAssignment}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'End of Employment', {!varFLName_M} + {!varEndofEmployment}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Full-Time/Part-Time', {!varFLName_M} + {!varFullTimePartTime}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'HOL', {!varFLName_M} + {!varHOL} , "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Immigration', {!varFLName_M} + {!varImmigration} , "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Internal Job Title Change', {!varFLName_M} +{!varInternalJobTitleChange} , "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Others', {!varOthers} , "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Pay Rates', {!varFLName_M} + {!varPayRates}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Pay and Bill Rates', {!varFLName_M} + {!varPayandBillRate}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Perdiem', {!varFLName_M} + {!varPerdiem} , "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Physical Work Address', {!varFLName_M} +{!varPhysicalWorkAddress} , "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Placement Status Change',{!varFLName_M} + {!varPlacementStatusChange} , "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'PTO', {!varFLName_M} + {!varPTO} , "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Remote Working', {!varFLName_M} + {!varRemoteWorking} , "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Time Sheet Approvers', {!varFLName_M} + {!varTimeSheetApprovers} , "")

formulas.name: varSpecialRates
formulas.expression:
"
" +"
"+ IF(ISBLANK({!Effective_Start_Date_SB}), "", "Effective Start Date: " + TEXT({!Effective_Start_Date_SB})+ "
") + IF(ISBLANK({!Effective_End_Date_SB}), "", "Effective End Date: " + TEXT({!Effective_End_Date_SB})+ "
") + If (ISBLANK({!Health_Welfare_Bill}), "", "Health & Welfare Bill: " + TEXT({!Health_Welfare_Bill})+ "
") + If (ISBLANK({!Holiday_Bill}), "", "Holiday Bill: " + TEXT({!Holiday_Bill})+ "
") + If (ISBLANK({!Meal_Premium_Bill}), "", "Meal Premium Bill: " + TEXT({!Meal_Premium_Bill})+ "
") + If (ISBLANK({!Mileage_Bill}), "", "Mileage Bill: " + TEXT({!Mileage_Bill})+ "
") + If (ISBLANK({!Night_Differential_Bill}), "", "Night Differential Bill: " + TEXT({!Night_Differential_Bill})+ "
") + If (ISBLANK({!Night_Differential_DT_Bill}), "", "Night Differential DT Bill: " + TEXT({!Night_Differential_DT_Bill})+ "
") + If (ISBLANK({!Night_Differential_OT_Bill}), "", "Night Differential OT Bill: " + TEXT({!Night_Differential_OT_Bill})+ "
") + If (ISBLANK({!On_Call_Pager_Bill}), "", "On Call/Pager Bill: " + TEXT({!On_Call_Pager_Bill})+ "
") + If (ISBLANK({!Sick_Pay_Billable_Bill}), "", "Sick Pay Billable Bill: " + TEXT({!Sick_Pay_Billable_Bill})+ "
") + If (ISBLANK({!Sick_Pay_Non_Billable_Bill}), "", "Sick Pay Non-Billable Bill: " + TEXT({!Sick_Pay_Non_Billable_Bill})+ "
") + If (ISBLANK({!Vacation_Billable_Bill}), "", "Vacation Billable Bill: " + TEXT({!Vacation_Billable_Bill})+ "
") +"
" + If (ISBLANK({!Health_Welfare_Pay}), "", "Health & Welfare Pay: " + TEXT({!Health_Welfare_Pay})+ "
") + If (ISBLANK({!Holiday_Pay}), "", "Holiday Pay: " + TEXT({!Holiday_Pay})+ "
") + If (ISBLANK({!Meal_Premium_Pay}), "", "Meal Premium Pay: " + TEXT({!Meal_Premium_Pay})+ "
") + If (ISBLANK({!Mileage_Pay}), "", "Mileage Pay: " + TEXT({!Mileage_Pay})+ "
") + If (ISBLANK({!Night_Differential_Pay}), "", "Night Differential Pay: " + TEXT({!Night_Differential_Pay})+ "
") + If (ISBLANK({!Night_Differential_DT_Pay}), "", "Night Differential DT Pay: " + TEXT({!Night_Differential_DT_Pay})+ "
") + If (ISBLANK({!Night_Differential_OT_Pay}), "", "Night Differential OT Pay: " + TEXT({!Night_Differential_OT_Pay})+ "
") + If (ISBLANK({!On_Call_Pager_Pay}), "", "On Call/Pager Pay: " + TEXT({!On_Call_Pager_Pay})+ "
") + If (ISBLANK({!Sick_Pay_Billable_Pay}), "", "Sick Pay Billable Pay: " + TEXT({!Sick_Pay_Billable_Pay})+ "
") + If (ISBLANK({!Sick_Pay_Non_Billable_Pay}), "", "Sick Pay Non-Billable Pay: " + TEXT({!Sick_Pay_Non_Billable_Pay})+ "
") + If (ISBLANK({!Vacation_Billable_Pay}), "", "Vacation Billable Pay: " + TEXT({!Vacation_Billable_Pay})+ "
")

formulas.name: varTimeSheetApprovers
formulas.expression:
"Effective Date: " + TEXT ({!Effective_Date_TSA}) + "
"+ "Primary Approver First Name: " + {!Primary_Approver_First_Name} + "
" + "Primary Approver Last Name: " + {!Primary_Approver_Last_Name}+ "
" + "Primary Approver Email address: " + {!Primary_Approver_Email}+ "
" + IF (ISBLANK({!PrimaryApproverPhone}), "", "Primary Approver Phone Number: " + {!PrimaryApproverPhone}+ "
") + "Alternate Approver First Name: " + {!Alternate_Approver_First_Name}+ "
" + "Alternate Approver Last Name: " + {!Alternate_Approver_Last_Name}+ "
" + "Alternate Approver Email address: " + {!Alternate_Approver_Email_address}+ "
" + IF (ISBLANK({!AlternateApproverPhone}),"", "Alternate Approver Phone Number: " + {!AlternateApproverPhone})

Flow.label: Portal - Fusion Ops Request

fields.fieldText: Account request with Case Number# {!GetCaseNumber.CaseNumber} has been created.

Percentage can't be more than 100.
Percentage can't be more than 100.

fields.fieldText: Do you want to update Special Bill Rates

fields.name: Do_you_want_to_update_Special_Pay
fields.fieldText: Do you want to update Special Pay Rates

fields.name: Do_you_want_to_update_Special_Rates
fields.fieldText: Do you want to update Special Rates

value.stringValue: Please create a New placement for this Change Changes are not applicable in the existing placement/ Assignment

fields.fieldText: The SLA is 24Hrs from the Request type creation date.﻿
